Turn the phone on its side. Feel around until you find the sweet spot. When you think you are on the right spot, hold down either volume button and slowly turn the phone to open the lock. Be careful, if you try to open the lock in the wrong spot, you will break the pick. If you feel too much resistance when turning the pick, let go of the button and try again.

1. Turn the pick (phone) on its side.

2. Feel around until you find the sweet spot.

3. When you think you are on the right spot, hold down either volume button and slowly turn the pick to open the lock.

4. Be careful, if you try to open the lock in the wrong spot, you will break the pick. If you feel too much resistance when turning the pick, let go of the button and try again.
Time Attack Mode. Start with 30 seconds and unlimited lock picks. Pick locks for more time. Press either volume key to begin.

Hold the phone on its side with the top facing forward like a key.
Turn the phone back and forth like a key until you feel it vibrate. Try to find the spot with the strongest vibration and hold it there.
When you are at the point with the strongest vibration, hold down either volume button and turn the phone to open the lock.

Your pick broke! When you start openning the lock in the right spot it will go smoothly, but when you start in the wrong spot then youll feel a lot of resistance. If you do, let go of the button and try again or else you will break your pick.
Congratulations, you just picked your first lock! Now go play the game!
